text: Thanks, Mark! I'll be there. Also, could you please confirm if QuickFix Elevator Co. will be there to talk about the repairs?
Great! Also, I wanted to mention that Mr. Thompson has been making me feel uncomfortable lately. He confronted me yesterday in the lobby about a noise complaint that wasn't even from my apartment.
Not yet, I'm gathering dates and times of these incidents to report. Last Wednesday, he waited for me at the mailboxes and started accusing me again.
Thank you, Mark. I appreciate it. See you at the meeting.
That's great news! I'll check them out when I get home.
